alert.note: Alert for Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 4:18AM EDT until March 30 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch late tonight into Wednesday morning. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Luce, Southern Schoolcraft and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 2 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The main part of the storm will be the mixed precipitation tonight into Wednesday morning. Light snow will occur for Wednesday night into Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
